DOC.brief_title: A 14 Day Early Bactericidal Activity Study Nitazoxanide Treatment Tuberculosis
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective randomize two-arm 14-day , early bactericidal activity study treatment-naive , drug-susceptible patient uncomplicated pulmonary tuberculosis ( TB ) . The study conduct GHESKIO Centers Port au Prince Haiti . Twenty patient randomized receive NTZ 1 gram orally twice daily 14 day . Ten patient randomized positive control receive standard 4 drug tuberculosis therapy isoniazid ( H ) , rifampin ( R ) , ethambutol ( E ) , pyrazinamide ( PZA ) . Patients ' sputum collect every two day 14 day treatment , primary endpoint change number M. tuberculosis patient ' sputum . Our primary hypothesis NTZ result significant decrease number M. tuberculosis sputum during14 day treatment . The number M. tuberculosis quantify time positive ( TTP ) signal hour automate liquid medium culture system ( BACTEC MGIT 960 , Becton Dickinson ) .
